name: Battle Toys
description:
BattleToys

builds on the original idea of a minigame called Wii Tanks and greatly expands into every direction. Navigate your little tank through various tough levels and worlds.
At every end of the world an unique strong boss awaits you.

Inclued Features:
  • 36 available levels spread across 4 worlds, more in development.
  • 4 available difficulties, from beginners and to pro-level gamers to offer a real challenge.
  • Unlock customizations and unique abilities that will help you through your campaign to make your journey easier (Currently available, but will be finished later on).
  • Full controller support. Navigating through menus and choose between 2 different control options.
  • Optimized for Low-End devices, available through the Graphic-Settings.
Planned Features:
  • Create your own levels with a level editor and share them online to challenge other players.
  • At least 80-100 levels with an unique completely different final boss.
  • Achievements, combined with unlockables such as customizations and abilities.
  • Steam Release: When it's finished, or ready for Early Access.
  • (Mobile version): Already tested and supported with mobile UI/Controls. Might be released later on.
  • (In consideration): A short simple story.
  • (In consideration): Different Gamemodes
  • (In consideration): Local Coop
Feedback:

Feedback and playtesters are strongly needed to improve the game and find undiscovered bugs.
If you have any bugs/questions/ideas or improvements for the game, please mail me under: support@sperlich.at or pifoxd@gmail.com or write a comment :)

Notice:

This is not the final product and it may differ from the final product. It is still in Beta and development has been going on for about ~10 months. You may encounter various bugs, Save-Game problems or launching issues. If you have any specific informations, please send me a mail.
